damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Armiger Warglaives are nimble and purposeful Knights that possess exceptional speed that allows them to outpace most vehicles. This, in combination with their thermal spears that can melt bunkers and battle-tank armour alike, makes them fearsome hunters of enemy war engines.

otherAbilities.name: Impetuous Glory:
otherAbilities.description: Each time this model makes a Charge move , until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
